channel.title: CVE Feed for Samsung Mobile -- Samsung Mobile Devices
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Samsung Mobile -- Samsung Mobile Devices

item.title: CVE-2023-42556|2023-12-05T02:44:14.014Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20mobile%20devices
item.description: Improper usage of implicit intent in Contacts prior to SMR Dec-2023 Release 1 allows attacker to get sensitive information.

item.title: CVE-2023-42537|2024-03-04T08:16:55.320Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20mobile%20devices
item.description: An improper input validation in get_head_crc in libsaped prior to SMR Nov-2023 Release 1 allows local attackers to cause out-of-bounds read and write.

item.title: CVE-2023-42560|2023-12-05T02:44:18.157Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20mobile%20devices
item.description: Heap out-of-bounds write vulnerability in dec_mono_audb of libsavsac.so prior to SMR Dec-2023 Release 1 allows an attacker to execute arbitrary code.

item.description: Heap out-of-bounds write vulnerability in bootloader prior to SMR Dec-2023 Release 1 allows a physical attacker to execute arbitrary code.

item.description: An improper input validation in saped_dec in libsaped prior to SMR Nov-2023 Release 1 allows local attackers to cause out-of-bounds read and write.

item.description: Out-of-bound write vulnerability in libIfaaCa prior to SMR Dec-2023 Release 1 allows local system attackers to execute arbitrary code.
